title: Winnipeg Richardson International Airport is hosting its first Travel expo Your Winter Getaway Starts HereTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Winnipeg Richardson International Airport is hosting its first Travel expo Your Winter Getaway Starts Here  
Winnipeg Richardson International Airport is hosting its first travel expo, YWG: Your Winter Getaway Starts Here. On Saturday, September 26, 2015 from 11am – 3pm , members of the public are invited to speak with travel agents, tour operators and other travel industry professionals, all in one convenient place, our community’s airport. This free event provides travellers with a one-stop-shop for all their vacation planning needs.
 
“The kids are back to school and the holidays are just around the corner, it’s the perfect time to start planning your next winter getaway,” said Kristen McLure, Manager, Marketing & Advertising at Winnipeg Airports Authority. “We invite members of the community to join us for our first airport travel expo; featuring more than a dozen exhibitors, live presentations, and the chance to win some excellent prizes.”
 
All exhibitors will be located on the Arrivals level (main floor) of the terminal; many of them drawing for exciting door prizes. There will also be presentations by exhibitors on specific products and offerings throughout the day.
 
Here is a listing of exhibitors:
 
 
Association of Canadian Travel Agencies Algonquin Travel & Cruise Centre Amazing Cruises and Safaris CAA Manitoba (CAA Travel) Canada One Travel Celebrity Cruises Continental Travel Group Courtyard by Marriott Expedia CruiseShipCenters Frontiers North Adventures Lakeview Hotels & Resorts Maritime Travel Marlin Travel Plaza Premium Lounge The Paradies Shops Travel and Events With Style Viscount Gort Hotel Winnipeg Airports Authority  
While mom and dad are busy planning their next trip, kids can visit with mascots Buzz and Boomer as well as Goldie and Goldette between 12pm and 1pm. Kids can also have fun by joining in a scavenger hunt for a chance to win a prize.
 
By completing a short survey at the Winnipeg Airports Authority booth, attendees 18 or older can enter a draw to win round-trip airfare for two from Winnipeg to any destination with direct service in Canada, the United States, Mexico or the Caribbean.
 
Sunwing is also offering round-trip airfare for two from Winnipeg to Fort Lauderdale with a seven-night Eastern or Western Caribbean cruise on board the MSC Divina. Attendees 18 or older can enter to win this prize.
 
For people who have not yet taken a trip from the new airport terminal, there will be hourly tours to explain what to do when arriving at the airport for a flight. Those interested in taking a tour are asked to report to the Information Booth on the main level of the terminal.
 
 
Source:- Winnipeg Richardson International Airport
